title: Award a Contract
description: The procurement department is ready to officially award a contract to the winning bidder.

tasks.description: Identify the contract and the selected winning vendor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The procurement officer has the details of the winning bid.

tasks.description: Generate the official contract documents for signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer successfully generates the legal contract.

tasks.description: Send the contract to the vendor for signature and notify the unsuccessful bidders of the outcome.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer sends the contract for execution and sends notifications to all other bidders.
